apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Ad-free music. For free!
apps.versionDescription:
"We’re always making changes and improvements to Spotify. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

Bug fixes and improvements in this version include:
- Fixed stability issues"

Tweaks
• com.julioverne.spotilife v1.7a 
• com.level3tjg.sposifyfix v0.0.6 
• com.spos v8.5.52
apps.localizedDescription: Tweaked version of Spotify that is completely ad-free and contains various customization features.

apps.name: YouTube++
apps.subtitle: Premium features for days!
apps.versionDescription:
"Bug fixes, stability improvements, repairs to space-time continuum."

Tweaks
• com.ps.noytpremium v1.0.3 
• com.ps.youpip v1.7.4 
• me.alfhaily.cercube v5.3.9 
• weeb.lillie.youtubedislikesreturn v1.6.5
apps.localizedDescription: Tweaked version of YouTube with awesome additional features, utilizing tweaks like Cercube to download videos and block ads, YouPiP to enable Picture-in-Picture and more. Install and explore now!

apps.name: Sneaky Sasquatch
apps.subtitle: Apple Arcade Game of the Year 2020!
apps.versionDescription:
We added lots of new things including: 
- The Town Hall is now open! 
- A permits office, so you can get a taxi license and drive people around 
- A records room that keeps track of high scores and leaderboards 
- A daily challenge board 
- An outfit customizer so you can create your own disguises 
- A new ski school to teach you how to do spins and flips 
- New skiing equipment and events 
- Running races to unlock shoes so you can run faster 
- New construction projects 

Thanks for playing! More updates will be coming soon!
apps.localizedDescription:
Live the life of a Sasquatch and do regular everyday Sasquatch stuff like:
- Sneak around campsites
- Disguise yourself in human clothing
- Eat food from unguarded coolers and picnic baskets
- And more!
